remarks: If two sets have equal nonzero cardinalities, then they are equinumerous.  (This assertion and ~ carden2b are meant to replace ~ carden in ZF without AC.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jan-2013.)
statement: carden2a $p |- ( ( ( card ` A ) = ( card ` B ) /\ ( card ` A ) =/= (/) ) -> A ~~ B ) $.
